channel.title: Cheat Macro Version 1.1
channel.description:
Cheat Macro is a scriptable macro designed as a universal cheat to most windows games. Cheat Macro can be used to build trainers, bots, ect...
The Cheat Macro scripting language is based off vb script, so it should be easy to make scripts for.
I am currently looking for scripters and input.
[B]http://www.cheatmacro.com/download.html[/B]
*NOTE* The installer I used uses code that passes as a virus on Jotti. Any compressed files will pass as either malware or potential malware on Jotti (Maybe some of you have noticed this). The installer is harmless.
Pictures:
[img]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/9779/99600345ip2.png[/img]
[img]http://img164.imageshack.us/img164/9456/24970511ax9.png[/img]
[img]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/1015/81967422jy6.png[/img]
